mapper.select: select c.convenient_seq, c.name, c.time, c.tel, c.img, cl.lat, cl.lng from tblconvenient c inner join tblconvenientlocation cl on c.convenient_seq=cl.convenient_seq where c.convenient_seq=#{seq}
select a.name, al.lat, al.lng from tblattraction a inner join tblattractionlocation al on a.attraction_seq=al.attraction_seq
select r.name, rl.lat, rl.lng from tblrestaurant r inner join tblrestaurantlocation rl on r.restaurant_seq=rl.restaurant_seq
select c.name, cl.lat, cl.lng from tblconvenient c inner join tblconvenientlocation cl on c.convenient_seq=cl.convenient_seq
select s.name, sl.lat, sl.lng from tblshop s inner join tblshoplocation sl on s.shop_seq=sl.shop_seq
select t.name, tl.lat, tl.lng from tbltheater t inner join tbltheaterlocation tl on t.theater_seq=tl.theater_seq
select p.name, pl.lat, pl.lng from tblphotozone p inner join tblphotozonelocation pl on p.photozone_seq=pl.photozone_seq
select f.name, fl.lat, fl.lng from tblfestival f inner join tblfestivallocation fl on f.festival_seq=fl.festival_seq
